description: woman in dark garment with billowing fabric at her PR elbow, at left; silhouettes of men at left and sitting on and standing beyond railing at center, with stone arch beneath; steps at left; spire, ULQ; black and white running dog, LRQ
marks:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [ LLC, in the print: [A. LEPÈRE]
provenance: [Arsène Bonafous-Murat, Paris, until 1990; sold in June for Fr ROOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1990-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Le Quai des Grands Augustins
